snippet.title: Mystic Pillars - Remastered - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games
snippet.description:
Mystic Pillars - Remastered is coming to PS5 on March 19th 2024 and is also going to be part of the PS+ catalog.

The game is a unique blend of intriguing puzzles and an immersive storyline set in Ancient India, providing you with an engaging gameplay experience.

Explore the Kingdom of Zampi in an all-new style with 4K textures, featuring a beautifully redrawn in-game map highlighting the culture and lifestyle along with improved user interface and cutscene art.

#ps5 #ps5games
